AddChoice.description:
DCOMBOBOX [Client] Adds a choice to the combo box

[string] value
  The text show to the user.

[any] data=nil
  The data accompanying this string. Accessed again with the second argument of DComboBox:GetSelected. If left empty, the value argument is used instead.

[boolean] select=false
  Should this be the default selected text show to the user or not.

ChooseOption.description:
DCOMBOBOX [Client] 

[string] value
  The text to display at the top of the combo box.

[number] index
  The option index.

ChooseOptionID.description:
DCOMBOBOX [Client] Selects an option within a combo box based on its table index.

[number] index
  Selects the option with given index.

GetOptionText.description:
DCOMBOBOX [Client] Returns an option's text based on the given index.

[number] index
  The option index.

OnSelect.description:
DCOMBOBOX [Client] Internal function which is called when an option in the combo box is selected. This function does nothing by default and is meant to be overridden in order to make the combo box functional.

[number] index
  The table index of the option.

[string] value
  The name of the option.

[any] data
  The data assigned to the option.

SetSortItems.description:
DCOMBOBOX [Client] 

[boolean] sort
  true to enable ( default )

SetValue.description:
DCOMBOBOX [Client] Sets the text shown in the combo box when the menu is not collapsed.

[string] value
  The text in the DComboBox.
